/* NotificationRepository.UpdateNotificationReadDt */
UPDATE CO_NOTIFICATION SET NOTIFICATION_READ_DT = SYSDATE(), UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE NOTIFICATION_ID = @NotificationId

/* NotificationRepository.RemoveNotification */
UPDATE CO_NOTIFICATION SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE 1=1
AND NOTIFICATION_ID = @NotificationId
AND USER_ID = @UserId
AND NOTIFICATION_KIND_CODE = @NotificationKindCode
